content: you have picked up 156/168/180 sts worry - it will be hidden if you tie it to a horizontal bar between sts near the top do not cut yarn join in the round being careful not to twist sts pm for beg of round sl m throughout fold the hats into each other and tack the two crowns together using the remaining tail and a knit in st st for 18-20 cm/7-8 to match first hat tapestry needle try to secure it by using a few stitches and then simply pull the rem tail in yes you will have a weird looking tube-sack and between the layers everyone will ask you what the heck you are knitting wet block or lightly spritz and iron press the brim hope you enjoyed the pattern thanks from bohoknits
